item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 8:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (38 points | 4 comments)
2. The motor turns too much (259 points | 101 comments)
3. Where Cruise Ships Go to Die. Meet the Man Saving Them (21 points | 4 comments)

6. Next Generation Out of Band Garbage Collection (102 points | 38 comments)
7. Ractor – a Rust Actor Framework (31 points | 8 comments)
8. Spann: Highly-Efficient Billion-Scale Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search (2021) (82 points | 22 comments)
9. Weird Lexical Syntax (358 points | 173 comments)
10. SpawELO – small free matchmaking system for LAN parties (129 points | 27 comments)
11. Show HN: A minimalist (brutalist?) website for sharing all your links (216 points | 124 comments)
12. Repeatability: As Difficult as it is Important (12 points | 1 comment)

14. Show HN: Someday, Open-Source Calendly Alternative for Gmail / Google App Script (227 points | 42 comments)

19. Colorado scrambles to change voting-system passwords after accidental leak (157 points | 329 comments)
20. Hacking the T2S+ Out of Fear: Get Lock-In Thermography for Free (229 points | 27 comments)
21. Toyota to buy clean power from a $1.1B solar farm in Texas (27 points | 14 comments)
22. Security flaws found in all Nvidia GeForce GPUs. Update drivers ASAP (97 points | 46 comments)
23. Prisma Postgres – Runs on bare metal and unikernels (224 points | 86 comments)
24. Inspecting North Korea's Digital Map App: Licensing and API Insights (39 points | 14 comments)
25. Ring-Based Mid-Air Gesture Typing System Using Deep Learning Word Prediction (47 points | 30 comments)
26. Boston Dynamics robot Atlas goes hands on [video] (152 points | 138 comments)
27. GitHub Spark lets you build web apps in plain English (45 points | 20 comments)
28. Show HN: Midnight Reminders via Morse Code (104 points | 39 comments)
29. Signal: Online MIDI Editor (123 points | 20 comments)
